headline: Dollar Tree (DLTR): “No More Value – Stay Away!” – Jim Cramer

headline: Futures buoyant ahead of data-driven week
summary: European sharesrose on Monday on upbeat German data and U.S. stock futures andthe dollar firmed at the start of a data-driven week, althoughthe threat of U.S. tariff hikes made investors cautious....
